mapper.insert: insert into userstatus (UID, updatedTime, state) values (#{UID}, #{updatedTime}, #{state})
mapper.update: update userstatus set state = #{state} where UID = #{UID}
mapper.select: select UID, updatedTime, state from userstatus
select count(1) from userstatus where TO_DAYS(updatedTime) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
